name: InspireMeNow
0:
”Alexa, open Inspire Me Now”
”Alexa, ask Inspire Me Now”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: inspire me now
des:
Inspire me now is a simple skill which pulls up an inspirational quote from a prominent personality and reads it out for you. We all need a dose once in a while and inspire me now is available anytime.

Give us a 5 ***** if you like the skill or leave your feedback as a review and we will improve on the same. For every 5 reviews we get, I promise to update the content on the skill with more inspiring notes.

If you need a custom skill developed, write to me at harish[at]fests.info
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
